website_summaries.verdict: Though it's only marginally more durable than the original Galaxy S5, the Galaxy S5 Active's physical buttons and high-end features keep it in Samsung's hit parade.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy S5 Active has a sturdy build, excellent physical controls, and a convenience key that double as a camera shutter
Inside, it has the same top-tier specs as the Galaxy S5
cons: It lacks a fingerprint scanner, it's slippery, and apart from its tougher aesthetic, the S5 Active isn't much tougher or athletically-minded than other dust- and water-resistant smartphones

customer_reviews.title: Samsung creates code in OS updates to force issues on old devices so you buy newer devices.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to replace an ageing S5 active that developed a flicker in the backlight after 18 months. This unit developed the same flicker when it updated the OS. Coincidence I think not!
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one at a slightly higher price due to the fact that it came with a charger and cable. Well it came with a charger alright, a kyocera 800ma charger with generic cable. Lol, this phone requires a 2ah charger manufactured by samsung. Granted most 2ah chargers made by anyone else would work but the 800ma charger would bearly charge the phone to 90% overnight. Also the physical condition was not acceptable but that kind of rating is subjective. I would have returned it but it was pirchased for a friend who desparately needed a phone and is willing to accept it. As far as functionality it seems to be fully functional.
customer_reviews.author: Russell D. Greig

customer_reviews.title: my S4 active lasted 3 years only reason i had to replace it was I could no longer get a good battery from samsung
customer_reviews.text: back cover replace 4 times keeps breaking.. even with a gorrilla glass front screen protector cracked screen after 4 weeks.. my S4 active lasted 3 years only reason i had to replace it was I could no longer get a good battery from samsung.. the s5 active lasted less than 2 months.. I've been a life long samsung customer but the s5 active does not a hold a candle to the s4 active. I have an s5 regular works great. I wished the active was better I prefer asthetically.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The phone is excellent, the hardware is perfectly balance with android KitKat ...
customer_reviews.text: The phone is excellent, the hardware is perfectly balance with android KitKat (4.4.2). Also, this Samsung model has all the Galaxy S5 features plus outdoor tools. Perfect companion for hiking activities.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Norat Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Worth the try!
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely refurbished which is not specified but I should have assumed. The phone did not hold a charge for more than a couple of hours on power save mode. I was a bit devastated at first because I couldn't afford to go without a phone during the return process but decided to try to buy a battery before the hassle of a return. I bought a Yontex battery replacement (less than $15) and the phone holds a charge all day and works as if new so I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Shaelyn Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Avoid dealing with Tetchytech,com
customer_reviews.text: Never worked correctly out of the box glitchy re-furbished S5. The company tetchytech won't help with the dead battery it came with, no extras (ear buds, charger or cables.) I can't recommend this company or the experience I had with this now paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Currie

customer_reviews.title: worst phone ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone from my boyfriend and I thought he was just complaining about it cuz he's switching from iPhone to Android well now I'm using it because I broke my other phone and it is a glitchy piece of crap doesn't want to work constantly stops in the middle of something shuts down at 10% battery life is just horrible
customer_reviews.author: Nichole S.

customer_reviews.title: Massive upgrade from an iPhone 4S, has some software issues.
customer_reviews.text: Massive improvement over the iPhone 4S that it replaced. The built-in case is very nice, and upgradeable/removable storage and battery pack are extremely useful. Screen looks very nice, camera works really well, 'Active' features work pretty good. Unfortunately on the software side it has had a number of issues that updates and factory reinstalls won't fix. Primarily, the keyboard crashes as do some other key apps. This is a problem found with many Android devices (particularly from Samsung, thanks Touchwiz) and even on its precedessing iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: so that's pretty annoying. This thing is built like a tank ...
customer_reviews.text: The back button is difficult to press and the charger input cover does not seal. This is my 3rd S5 active and neither of my previous phones had this problem, so that's pretty annoying. This thing is built like a tank so I didn't expect anything but visual wear. --------- Update: I took the rubber charger cover off to replace it with the one on my phone. When attached to my other phone it worked perfectly, but on this phone it doesn't work. And the one I thought was broken, attached to this pjone, works perfectly on my old phone. What a POS phone. Can't wait to get more water damage :-)
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: ... and other percents it has others problems as well like restart itself all the time and seems to have ...
customer_reviews.text: This item shipped seemed to be everything I wanted and expected till I wentered to use this item it does hold a charge at all it will shut off at 50% at times at times shuts off at 70% and other percents it has others problems as well like restart itself all the time and seems to have a short or something else going on with it not very happy at all considering it was a brand new item that I paid just short of 200 bucks for always ordered all my items here but do to this I think I will go elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: amanda deavers

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Love the Active because of how durable it is. You'll never get anything this heavy duty in an iphone. We've had 10 of these deployed for our installation department. In the 3 years they had them, we never broke one screen. And our guys are not gentle on the phones.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFREY L GETTLE

customer_reviews.title: Crappy fixed and one year later still have ugly phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone had broken corner and eventually crack got big enough to compromise waterproof seal. Crappy fixed and one year later still have ugly phone but works
customer_reviews.author: Allevo

customer_reviews.title: Software bugs ruin a potentially solid phone
customer_reviews.text: Good phone when it actually works....I love the features and the nice rugged design. The camera is great outdoors. All of this is nice except the phone keeps shutting off, freezing or restarting on its own. I have updated the latest software, scanned forums for potential fixes but there are none. The phone just shuts down for no reason at all on a daily basis. This is embarrassing when you are trying to do business or personal phone calls and it keeps restarting in the middle of it. I just switched from an IPhone and now I wonder WHY THE HELL I DID.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Bayman

customer_reviews.title: Defective Phone - Ace W Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Received cell phone with a defect. Phone should be waterproof. After first time in water, phone shorts out. Upon closer investigation, phone has small hole defect in "back" button which I didn't give concern to upon receipt. This allowed water in the case. The problem is, I am outside the return window for the phone. I am disappointed the vendor sent a defective product. Maybe, I can dry it out. Otherwise, I have a nice $150 piece of junk. Don't buy from Ace W Warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: W. von Aspe

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, glitches
customer_reviews.text: I bought this refurbished which said looks new, no problems. It glitches right out the gate. I tried to deal with it but it was to much. It heated to high when charging or using.
customer_reviews.author: E s

customer_reviews.title: BIG THUMBS DOWN!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is horrible. Battery won't hold a charge at all and got new battery and same issue. Can't get into wake locks and didn't realize this phone was all refurb. I should have gotten from AT&T directly as new phone was the same price. Phone was not phone for USA and had several hacks since getting it. Very disappointing! !
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Phone randomly stopped working 3 months after purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new-in-box Samsung S5 Active from this seller, but after a few months the phone will no longer read a sim-card. Rendering the phone virtually useless... Good experience with seller other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Water resistance so long as the back stays on. ...
customer_reviews.text: Water resistance so long as the back stays on. When I dropped my phone near a pool's edge, the back popped off before the phone hit the water...now it's a paperweight. Put it in a ziploc bag or have a case that prevent the back from popping loose.
customer_reviews.author: qpham63

customer_reviews.title: This is a great phone! I had a Samsung Galaxy S5 when ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great phone ! I had a Samsung Galaxy S5 when I bought this one. I like the fact that it is a little bit more rugged and handles water and falls better, because it is water resistant and has a titanium glass screen. I was able to find a brand new Samsung Galaxy S5 Active on Amazon for $260! the Samsung phones from my experience is that the iPhones do not have as good of a internal antenna as a Samsung phone. this phone is very well worth the money and runs very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Parker

customer_reviews.title: It survided my first day at work with it.
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded to this from a LG expression. A huge jump as it were. I am very satisfied. The phone works great and as described. Additionally it is very compatible. As for the rugged design I'd say it is so far good. As my first smart phone I am still not used to carrying it and dropped it on the first day I took it to work. Even so the device is still impeccable. I was worried that the camera would be hurt because it sticks out. No such damage though. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: javi

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, don't hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: Best buy I've ever made. I got this phone for a great deal when I was trying to change my life and start to loose weight. This was the best decision I've ever made. It tracks my food, sleep, steps, gives me pointers and motivates me when exercising. I've dropped it multiple times and still runs great. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY DEAD ON ARRIVAL
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this phone 10 days ago, but the battery won't hold a charge. I contact customer service to rectify the problem and was told I would have to purchase a new battery. I don't know what Harry Potter Scam you running, but how is it fair for me to have purchased a phone with a defect battery and I'm responsible for purchasing a new battery?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i mean its not bad but
customer_reviews.text: got this because its supposed to be more rugged. but every time i drop the phone the back case pops off making the water tight seal useless. the speaker is on the back side of the phone which makes it useless when looking at the screen. several things have changed in this version of android versus previous versions which have become bothersome, such as not having the ability to turn mobile data on/off from the quick access menu. the alarm clock shuts off after a minute. which was supposed to be fixed by an update but apparently still pops up for some people.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy 5 has problems when answering calls
customer_reviews.text: This phone had to be returned. If you took a call - the caller could not hear you. Had to switch to the speakerphone. Was very easy to exchange it for a newer model phone.
customer_reviews.author: dpol

customer_reviews.title: Great seller..great product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned because I read a few not so great reviews after I placed my order. I contacted seller and got an immediate response. Before I even received my package which by they way was delivered 8 days early...way to go seller!!! Phone is brand new as described and works perfect. Easy setup. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, works perfect. I needed this item before vacation and had contacted the seller and it arrived immediately. I would buy again as well as recommend this seller. Thanks again!!!
customer_reviews.author: NurseHannah

customer_reviews.title: Sworked for me
customer_reviews.text: I work outside in the Texas weather and am hard on phones. I have had this phone for almost 2 years with no additional case. This is a miracle considering the 3 yrs prior I went through 4 phones.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: appeared to be in good working order however
customer_reviews.text: I received my phone on time, appeared to be in good working order however, after a couple days I realized that my phone dies quickly. Not sure if this is a failure in the battery or the phone. It may say 50% battery life then be dead within 15 minutes. This is my 3rd 5 active and my first refurbished purchase... I expected it to out perform the ones I purchased used, but the phone does Look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Active is not how this phone should be described. Dropped once from approximately 18 inches. Broken built on case. Anytime this phone hits a surface the whole thing comes apart and you scramble to find the battery, back, and memory card since there is little in phone storage. The camera lens protrudes so it is scratched all over before you ever to lake a picture. All in all, NOT worth a cent. Better designs are out there
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Both a faulty phone and a faulty battery.  Probably selling refurbished or returned-defective items as "new."
customer_reviews.text: The back cover does not fit properly. It is loose and there are gaps around the edge. Therefore, the water-resistant design of this phone is worthless on the item this company sent me. Plus, the phone senses the loose cover and continuously asks me to check the cover, but I can't fix it, so I have to live with the bad cover and repeatedly deal with the warning message. Also, the battery they sent with the phone completely died after four months. It would seem that they sent me a faulty phone AND a faulty battery. Both items faulty? A coincidence? I do not believe in such coincidences.
customer_reviews.author: JSS

customer_reviews.title: very nice. It takes some getting use to if u ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice. It takes some getting use to if u have been suing iphones for years like I have but it seems like a nice phone.I like the screen being big enough to type but not too big to put by my ear. Color is darker then how it seems in picture but I will put a case on it anyway, so that's ok. all in all once u get used to the android it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Cherri

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm coming from using an lg volt with virgin mobile and I had to make a change because the service and the phone seemed to be getting worse as each day passed. This was my first time ordering a used phone and what a great first experience this was. The phone came within 4 days despite Christmas holiday traffic. The phone is in GREAT condition and does everything I need and more. I'm really thankful for how thorough cellular trendz is in their work and I am definitely a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Supreme deals made it right.
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought two of these phones. The phones themselves worked great and appeared to be brand new. They both arrived in samsung packaging which looked to be original. The batteries and chargers were problematic. Niether battery held a good charge and one battery would shut down at random intervals below 50 percent. The transformers on both chargers were bad. HOWEVER, Max with Supreme deals made it right by immediately sending out two brand new batteries and two brand new chargers. The phones, batteries and chargers are all operating nicely. Thank you Max!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I am still learning to use the phone
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I am still learning to use the phone. Took some GREAT photo's on a recent trip. There are some things that seem glitchy, but also could simply be me learning to use the device. Upgraded the SD micro card to a 32 GB for a whopping $24. I really like that option and it is a significant reason why I went with the S5 Active vs. the S6. Too bad Samsung is no longer offering that option going forward. Because of it, this will probably be my last Galaxy. :>(
customer_reviews.author: Dmojoman57

customer_reviews.title: It's a great phone and the company I bought it from has ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone and the company I bought it from has excellent service for return product My only negative comment is th as the phone had a screen protector on it and I didn't notice it till after I had everything transfered over from my wife's old phone Then I noticed it had bubbles We will live with it but was sad to see a brand new phone with defects
customer_reviews.author: mark duran

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: I was said to have to finally lay down my galaxy 3 after so many years of great service. However this phone I have been using for around two months seems to be a fine replacement. I havent had anything negative to say about this phone because so far the phone works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jeremy quillen

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY USED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband's Birthday and fathers day next week. He was really excited about it so I let him have it early. I received it on Wednesday evening and it worked great until this morning when his alarm went off. All the sounds are working but screen would not come on it just flashes white at us and goes right back off. It did this for about 5 mins and now it decides when it will and won't work. Definately returning it and very disappointed because now my husband doesn't have a present for fathers day or his birthday. Already wasted money on a screen protector thats already on the phone and a case that hasn't arrived yet.
customer_reviews.author: BeMyPenguin

customer_reviews.title: Condition of phone was excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I was very weary of ordering a used and not reconditioned phone. But after reading reviews and reading description of the Samsung Galaxy S5 Active that I wanted I took a chance and placed an order. I was very surprised to find the condition of my phone looked almost new! I don't know if every order is described so well on every phone, but I am EXTREMELY happy! Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Mickle

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to write a bad review, but I hoping this get the seller's ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to write a bad review, but I hoping this get the seller's attention. When I first bought the phone, I was very happy with it, only issue was people said they couldn't hear me very clearly during calls, I didn't think it was big deal until recently the microphone failed all together, having tried countless software fixes I can only conclude that I bought a phone with a defective microphone. Future buyers please be wary of buying used products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure this phone will be good, I had the galaxy s5 prior to this ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this phone will be good, I had the galaxy s5 prior to this and liked it , it's easy to use and for the price I will use this one until the s6 & s7 are cheaper to buy. I'm rating it lower because the ear buds in the box were broken and exposed wires even tho they were still wrapped in the plastic for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works Great, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift and they love it. Refurbished item had minor scratches on the edges, but other than that, it works perfect. Bought this because the Samsung 6 Active doesn't have an SSD memory slot. Worked fine, right out of the box, shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper Warren

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Samsung Galaxy S5 Active phone. I live in the country and have a rugged lifestyle. The S5 Active has fit my needs easily. I do keep a protective case on it and I have dropped mine on occasion. I have yet to have it submerged in water (hopefully I never will) but if it lives up to its billing that should be no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Donita C.

customer_reviews.title: Quality phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and phone holds up to a lot of dropping. Good camera and display screen. The reason it's not 5 star is because I'm not a fan of android phones in general, but is definitely one of the best made phoned out there.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Especially nice because you can have extra ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone . Especially nice because you can have extra batteries so you never need to wait on a sloweekend charge . Camera is decent , but oit dated .
customer_reviews.author: Rob Mcnew

customer_reviews.title: and has been working fine for the two months I've had it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone after my Galaxy S6 Active suddenly died on me in January. Arrived quickly, and has been working fine for the two months I've had it. Slightly annoying that whenever I unplug it from a charger it gives me a pop-up reminding me to make sure the charger port cover is sealed, but I think that's just the model in general not the seller or anything. Can run everything my S6 ran as well, though it's a little slow to load some larger apps like Pokémon GO.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer113

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: The phone was in really bad condition. For the price of about $180 I expected more. The edges were all chewed up and worn away. The phone literally opened because of the screen not being secured right. On the second day I had it, the phone fell once and the screen cracked. I thought this was suppose to be a sturdy phone? If the screen was replaced in the past it most of been with really cheap material. I stopped using it and just got me another note 4 for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera  and phone
customer_reviews.text: Really just wanted something that was durable and had a good camera. It has been a lot better than my previous cell phone and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone if you don't want the larger S6 or S7.
customer_reviews.text: I recently upgraded from a Samsung S3 only because it finally died. I did not want the larger S6 or S7. The S5 is only slightly larger than the S3 and works perfectly for my needs. Haven't tested out the waterproof feature yet. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME..
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME... got the phone & it was everything that was advertised. 220.00 basically 4 a brand new galaxy s5 active phone. Won't ever buy a phone or upgrade thru ATT again. UPS IS THE BEST... ordered on Thurs evenin & got it Fri at 300 p.m. only 3.00 for expedited shipping. So pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Best deal and great phone!
customer_reviews.text: It took only 1 day to get the phone, I saved $50 buying it from Amazon, AT&T helped me set it up, took all of 10 minutes and I was ready to go! The phone is great. AT&T wouldn't extend the price to me that Amazon had (AT&T wanted 199.00). Don't let the phone company try to scare you aware from buying through Amazon, it's a much better deal plus I can trade in my old phone and get almost the entire price of the new phone back! Can't beat it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: imdevine

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and fast  shipping
customer_reviews.text: This was a great replacement for my old phone. And it shipped super fast. I was concerned about not buying the phone from a brick and mortar store, but this was a good experience. This phone showed up in better condition than I expected and works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Gomez

customer_reviews.title: I am enjoying this product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second S5 we have in our household. I like the solid feel of the extra protection on the phone. Since phones are such a personal item I would recommend you check it out before buying. I am enjoying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Waitforclick

customer_reviews.title: had an s4 that works 10 times better..
customer_reviews.text: Had the phone for a little over and freezes all the time....had an s4 that works 10 times better...don't buy...most likely has old guts in it...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone...Install an sd card and you can move your downloaded apps to it. This phone is fast and the screen is easily seen outside.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: They can hear me fine but I hear nothing
customer_reviews.text: The phone usually performs ok except on days that I cannot hear the other caller without calling back one or more times. They can hear me fine but I hear nothing. This is becoming very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: No issues, can still use it to this day
customer_reviews.text: I have since upgraded my phone several times, but this phone still worked great and I never had any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Phone shuts off randomly and won't turn back on unless ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone shuts off randomly and won't turn back on unless u remove the battery. I'm hoping it is just the battery not a junk phone...
customer_reviews.author: Kenwa

customer_reviews.title: No deal
customer_reviews.text: This phone was returned for full refund. It would shut off with 50% battery left but would start up once it was plugged into the charger. The sound was garbled and speaker sounded cracked. The only positive was I got a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, durable phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone has been very reliable. It came in great shape, even though it was used. I'd highly recommend this phone to others if they are a fan of android. I've always been a wee bit clumsy and I have dropped this phone multiple times, but it just keeps on working great.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: My son's phone died, this is a good replacement
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd active I bought for my son. He is a teenager and it is a good phone for them. I have only bought used ones for him but for a little over 100, it is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Family

customer_reviews.title: Think again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough phone but the "active" part isn't worth it. It's not very protected. You're better off getting the standard 5s and a life proof case. They don't make life proof for the active.
customer_reviews.author: TMFD

customer_reviews.title: My hubby is a mechanic so when he considered upgrading ...
customer_reviews.text: My hubby is a mechanic so when he considered upgrading his phone he was really worried about what could handle the daily abuse. We saw this while shopping around and he was deadset on getting it. He loves the feel and weight of the phone, and that he didn't have to go away from his samsung, since all of us in the house have samsungs.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hoxsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Got way sooner then guaranteed delivery date and was so happy. Fast shipping and Excellent phone that works perfect. It's says in description when you buy that it may have "scuffs or scratches". My Samsung galaxy s3 active was Perfect. Not a mark or scratch. It was new to me for real. Excellent. Will buy next phone from here again and again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone had the S2 before and the battery last a lot longer then the S2. I would have to charge the S2 at the end of every day. The S5 I have to charge every three to four day way better. I really like all the new features also.
customer_reviews.author: John Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Camera lends cover scratched up
customer_reviews.text: Slow & sluggish camera lends cover scratched up. Worst mic I've ever had on a phone. Wouldn't purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend of mine and he likes it very much. Has had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two stars for phone arriving defective but 5 stars for the return processing and refund.
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for phone arriving defective but 5 stars for the return processing. I ordered and Received the phone. The exterior looked as described as like new. I took it to Att. They tried to set it up but said It was defective. Screen showed white and green lines only and Att said it was a defective motherboard issue and couldnt be fixed I Returned the phone and received a refund on Jan2.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Schmucky

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this through Edge Cellular. 30 day warranty and came exactly as described. Came with a knock off charger but it is efficient and charges my phone quickly
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Phone was not unlocked.  Do not pay for extra shipping
customer_reviews.text: The phone works great. However the device was not unlocked when it was advertised as unlocked. I had to go to a local business and pay to unlock the phone. Also the shipping look longer. Paid for 2 day shipping ended up taking 3 days. If I had known I would not have paid extra for shipping. Disappointed with the extra hassle and cost.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: The factory seal was broken when the phone arrived. ...
customer_reviews.text: The factory seal was broken when the phone arrived. This was suppose to be new. Checking things further I found out the ATT phones came with SIM cards, that's what was taken out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Was a gift for my husband and he love it.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband and was very happy but the problem is that the battery it doesn't last longer enough so he has to charge it every day and he doesn't use frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Mass

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone looks and feels extremely durable perfect fit for my son who breaks all his phones!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Really durable phone, doesn't lag on me or show any signs of faultiness. Works like a dream basically though I hope this performance will last. Overall, I believe this was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Phone
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent phone at 1st. But my husband has only had it for about 7 months. It says the screen is shatter resistant and he had it in his pocket and bent over and the screen cracked. Phone is still operational but kind of disappointed that the screen isn't all that shatter resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Kat fry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome (but come on people its not indestructable)
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome phone. Had the S4 Active which I loved. Upgraded to the S5 Active and love it even more. Seems to be a improvement in every way. Price was great through Amazon. I'll update if I find any hang ups.
customer_reviews.author: R.R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent cell phone that flickers in the cold
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone used and seems to work good except seems to flicker bad in the cold, I have had 3 other samsung s5 actives that did not flicker
customer_reviews.author: Jeris Vermeer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Samsung Galaxy S5 Active, Titanium, phone has done it's job by pleasing my husband! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: TOUGH PHONE!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I haven't broken it yet, lol. Broke 3 IPhone 5c screens, and had to learn how to replace screens myself to save money, lmbo!! But this one is way tougher...
customer_reviews.author: Mark Whitefox

customer_reviews.title: Terrible phone
customer_reviews.text: It constantly turns on and off on its own. Very slow operating system. When I got it in the mail the box was ripped up. I think it may be a counterfeit phone. Only 1 star because I actally received it. This phone sucks big time. Get an iphone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best phone I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Love these phones! Take a beating and work flawlessly. I highly recommend this phone to anyone who has an active job or lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M.

customer_reviews.title: ... have had the phone 2 days and am very pleased. I took it to at&t store and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the phone 2 days and am very pleased. I took it to at&t store and they hooked it up and ran a diagnostic test and everything was good. The phone looked pretty much brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I do want to mention that I am very pleased with the active
customer_reviews.text: I have, admittedly, had the Galaxy S for 6 years before purchasing the S5 Active; so I won't go into much detail about how blown away I am. I do want to mention that I am very pleased with the active; the standard feels cheap by comparison. The mechanical menu, home and back button take a few days to get used to. I wasnt certain i liked them at first, but I am now very fond of them. I don't use the active button much, but it's useful for whipping out the flashlight (which is fantastic, btw.)
customer_reviews.author: Logan Stallworth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Said it was in "Very good" condition, came with a cracked screen.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Moore

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Looks like it has never been used. It came earlier than the seller expected it to. Happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Sariah Hern

customer_reviews.title: not the best quality
customer_reviews.text: When speaking tp people via the speaker, there seems to be a lit of noise, deaf spots, cutting in and out. Have to use headphones 90% of the time. hoping this is not a refurbished or imitation/cloned fake phone.
customer_reviews.author: gilw

customer_reviews.title: I like this, but it's not very red
customer_reviews.text: I like this, but it's not very red. I was hoping to be able to find my phone easier! Battery cover goes on very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Used Samsung S5
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone knowing it was used since my service provider was charging for upgrades phones. It shows signs of quite a bit of use. But it has worked great as needed.
customer_reviews.author: amazon kennedy

customer_reviews.title: From the get go it could hardly handle a simple app like snapchat and doesn't do well with multiple apps at ...
customer_reviews.text: Let's see... the phone didn't last a year before it was too bogged down. From the get go it could hardly handle a simple app like snapchat and doesn't do well with multiple apps at once. Camera is great. Speaker isn't forward facing so it isn't very loud etc etc... I guess just overall this phone isn't very good at least not in 2017.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L.

customer_reviews.title: Have been using this for a little over a month and so far I'm extremely pleased with its durability
customer_reviews.text: Received in a timely manner and it was packaged appropriately. Have been using this for a little over a month and so far I'm extremely pleased with its durability.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S5 Active
customer_reviews.text: Great phone fast shipping and the best pricing. Will purchase from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Chief

customer_reviews.title: works great & he likes it
customer_reviews.text: got it to replace my sons damaged phone. works great & he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: joanne

customer_reviews.title: Front Facing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone almost a year ago, and now the front facing camera is not working. When I open it, it tells me Server Error Occurred. Restart Camera. I have had AT&T look at it, I have reset my phone twice, uninstalled the camera app.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: The phone is great - it performs very well
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great - it performs very well. However, it came locked and it took about three weeks for the supplier to get me the unlock code. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Johng

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't get calls, texts
customer_reviews.text: The phone I received often lags and it takes several hours for some texts to come in, and it will not receive many calls even though it says they are going through on my daughters phone. It is very unfortunate. Battery life is also very short compared to the s5active I previously owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, lovin' the phone!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! Finally found a phone I would gladly buy again! Thank you for a great purchase experience, too!
customer_reviews.author: Andie

customer_reviews.title: Glad they put a picture with their phones so you ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured and advertised. Glad they put a picture with their phones so you actually know what you are getting. Shipped promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Fravel

customer_reviews.title: Love the phone, hate the back of it though :/
customer_reviews.text: I love the phone itself, but the back part has already cracked. I literally had it in my case the whole time and took it out so i could check on it and it was broken on the back in two spots. I guess that means it isn't waterproof now but its still the phone i really wanted so im not sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy,  bad microphone
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. Microphone goes out often on phone calls. Have to toggle speakerphone
customer_reviews.author: SimJ10

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy camper..
customer_reviews.text: When I place the phone down it keeps turning off and rebooting..acts as if its refurbished.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Great rugged design !
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the guy who breaks all the phones! Son works in construction and tends to break every phone he owns , it's been 2 months with no problems! The rugged design works for him !
customer_reviews.author: lilaw0709

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S5 Active, Titanium Gray 16GB (AT&T)
product_meta.description: Made for active lifestyles with a casing that's dust proof and water-resistant, the Galaxy S 5 Active is engineered to withstand the rigors of your workout and your world. It delivers integrated technology that improves your life and makes every day better.
